t: Amazon Introduces New Customer Journey Analytics Tool for Brands | Swipe Insight
s: January 5, 2025 - Amazon has launched a Customer Journey Analytics tool in its Brand Analytics suite, enabling brands to track customer interactions throughout the purchasing journey. It provides insights into customer engagement during awareness, consideration, intent, and purchase stages.

t: New To Brand Metrics
